scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT cst_id AS client_id,
cst_firstname AS firstname,
cst_lastname AS lastname,
cst_marital_status AS marital_status
FROM BRONZE.Clientes',

query: 'SELECT CID AS client_id,
BDATE AS birth_date,
GEN AS gender
FROM BRONZE.Clientes_BD_GEN',
query: 'SELECT CID AS client_id,\nCNTRY AS location\nFROM BRONZE.Clientes_location',

query: 'SELECT SUBSTRING(prd_key, 7) AS product_key,
SUBSTRING(prd_key, 0, 6) AS category_key,
prd_nm AS product_name,
prd_cost AS cost
FROM BRONZE.Productos',

query: 'SELECT ID AS category_key,
CAT AS category,
SUBCAT AS sub_category,
MAINTENANCE AS maintenance
FROM BRONZE.Productos_Cat_Mant',

query: 'SELECT sls_ord_num AS sale_id,
sls_prd_key AS product_key,
sls_cust_id AS client_id,
sls_order_dt AS order_date,
sls_ship_dt AS ship_date,
sls_quantity AS quantity
FROM BRONZE.Detalle_ventas',
